results.raw_content:
Shanghai Fullhan Microelectronics Co., Ltd.
Appliances, Electrical, and Electronics Manufacturing
About us
Fullhan Microelectronics was established in April 2004. Fullhan is a leading provider of advanced video codec IPs and chips for the next generation multimedia applications. Our products could be widely applied in broadband IP STB, DVB STB, mobile TV, HD DVD, SD DVD, Blu-ray DVD, digital TV and digital security surveillance, etc.
Fullhan works closely with solution providers and equipment manufacturers from domestic and worldwide to provide high performance, cost-effective products and services, increase market shares and achieve substantial business success.
